text: Dájúdájú Allāhu ti sọ àlá Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀ di òdodo pé - tí Allāhu bá fẹ́ - dájúdájú ẹ̀yin yóò wọ inú Mọ́sálásí Haram ní ẹni ìfàyàbalẹ̀. Ẹ máa fá irun orí yín; ẹ máa gé irun (orí yín mọ́lẹ̀), ẹ ò sì níí páyà. Nítorí náà, (Allāhu) mọ ohun tí ẹ̀yin kò mọ̀. Yàtọ̀ sí ìyẹn, Ó tún ṣe ìṣẹ́gun t’ó súnmọ́ (fun yín)
